==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=丗,卋,㔺}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – three leaves on a branch. The derivative {{och-l|葉}} refers to the original word.

===Etymology===
{{och-l|世}} is derived from iterative devoicing of {{och-l|葉|leaf}} + *''-s'' suffix, meaning successive foliages of a tree > generations. Compare {{cog|bo|ལོ་མ||leaf}}, Western {{cog|bo|ལོབ་མ||leaf}} and {{cog|bo|ལོ||year}}.
